name: Adventures of Bodnar
description:
Fight off the horde of zombies playing as the heroine known as Bodnar!

Current Features

-Costumes: Currently pick from 3 different costumes!

-6 Different weapons

+Duel Swords, Pistol, Assualt rifle, Shotgun, Sniper, and a Crossbow!

Features in progress

-Survival mode

-Different Difficulties

This is currently a work in progress and thus not complete yet.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Update 1.0.4.0

Game now saves progress and records

-Adventure mode now saves your progress at the start of every level.

-Survival now saves how long you have survived, once you past 5 minutes, and how many zombies killed as records.

Survival has 2 stages that can be chosen

-Underground and Secret Facility

New Menus

-Survival has a new menu that allows for stage selection and viewing records.

-Adventure has a new menu that lets you either continue from a previous game or start a new game.

New Sounds

-Crates now have a new sound when breaking.

-Destroyable rocks have a new sound when breaking.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
